00037 linearMotion::linearMotion(std::string canonL, machineStatus prevStatus): canonMotion(canonL,prevStatus) {
00038   gp_Pnt a,b;
00039   a = status.getStartPose().Location();
00040   b = status.getEndPose().Location();
00041   //TODO: add support for 5 or 6 axis motion
00042 
00043   TopoDS_Edge e = BRepBuilderAPI_MakeEdge(a,b).Edge();
00044   myUnSolid = e;
00045 
00046   //check if the swept shape will be accurate
00047   //use the ratio of rise or fall to distance
00048   double deltaZ = abs(a.Z() - b.Z());
00049   double dist = a.Distance(b);
00050   if ( (deltaZ/dist) > 0.001) {
00051     sweepIsSuspect = true;
00052   }
00053 
00054   BRepOffsetAPI_MakePipeShell pipe(BRepBuilderAPI_MakeWire(e).Wire());
00055   TopoDS_Wire w = TopoDS::Wire(status.getTool()->getProfile());
00056   if (!w.Closed()) {
00057     uio::infoMsg("Wire not closed!");
00058   } else {
00059     pipe.Add(w,false,true);
00060     //pipe.Add(tool2d,false,true);
00061     pipe.SetTransitionMode(BRepBuilderAPI_RoundCorner); //there shouldn't be any discontinuities, but we'll set this anyway
00062     pipe.SetMode(gp_Dir(0,0,1)); //binormal to vector 0,0,1 - profile can only rotate about Z now
00063 //    infoMsg("added tool\n");
00064     if ( pipe.IsReady() ) {
00065         pipe.Build();
00066         BRepBuilderAPI_PipeError error = pipe.GetStatus();
00067         switch (error) {
00068           case BRepBuilderAPI_PipeNotDone:
00069             uio::infoMsg("Pipe not done");
00070             errors = true;
00071             break;
00072           case BRepBuilderAPI_PlaneNotIntersectGuide:
00073             uio::infoMsg("Pipe not intersect guide");
00074             errors = true;
00075             break;
00076           case BRepBuilderAPI_ImpossibleContact:
00077             uio::infoMsg("Pipe impossible contact");
00078             errors = true;
00079             break;
00080           case BRepBuilderAPI_PipeDone:
00081             //ready = true;
00082             break;
00083          default:
00084             uio::infoMsg("Pipe switch default?!");
00085             errors = true;
00086         }
00087     }
00088   }
00089   if (!errors) {
00090     //FIXME: each canonMotion obj should check if its startpoint is colinear with the endpoint of the previous object. If not, it should add a 3d model of the tool there.
00091 
00092     //for now, we'll add one at each end of every obj.
00093     //gp_Vec sv = status.getStartVector();
00094     //gp_Vec ev = prevStatus.getEndVector();
00095     //BRepBuilderAPI_Transform
00096     //BRepBuilderAPI_GTransform
00097 
00098     //mySolid = pipe.Shape();
00099     //TopoDS_Solid& tl = status.getTool()->getRevol();
00100 
00101     gp_Trsf tr; //FIXME must be initialized
00102     gp_Pnt a(0,0,0),b;
00103     b=status.getStartPose().Location();
00104     tr.SetTranslation(a,b);
00105     TopoDS_Shape r = BRepBuilderAPI_Transform (status.getTool()->getRevol(),tr);
00106 
00107 
00108     dispShape dr(r,5);
00109     dr.display();
00110     /*
00111     dispShape dp(pipe.Shape(),5);
00112     dp.display();
00113     */
00114     uio::fitAll();
00115     uio::infoMsg("done");
00116 
00118 
00122 
00123     //mySolid = TopoDS::Solid(pipe.Shape());
00125     //infoMsg("pipe not ready!");
00126     mySolid = status.getTool()->getRevol();
00127   }
00128 
00129 }
00130 
00131 //need to return RAPID for rapids...
00132 MOTION_TYPE linearMotion::getMotionType() {
00133   static bool traverse = clMatch("STRAIGHT_TRAVERSE");
00134   if (traverse) {
00135     return TRAVERSE;
00136   } else if (clMatch("STRAIGHT_FEED")) {
00137     return LINEAR;
00138   } else {
00139     std::string err = "linearMotion::getMotionType failed on canonLine:\n" + myLine + "\n\nExiting.";
00140     uio::infoMsg(err);
00141     exit(1);
00142   }
00143 }
